Prophylactic measures include deep vein thrombosis prevention with boots and subcutaneous unfractionated heparin, stress ulcer prophylaxis with an H2 blocker, and ventilator-associated pneumonia prevention with head-of-bed elevation, mouth care, and daily wake-up and respiratory system assessment.

Overall, the patient is critically ill and requires close monitoring and management in the ICU.
